1.name: The Poor Little Rich Girl
1.description: The wealthy but selfish parents of a lonely young girl begin to rethink what is important to them after a servant's irresponsibility results in a crisis.

2.name: Cleopatra
2.description: The story of Cleopatra, the fabulous queen of Egypt, and the epic romances between her and the greatest men of Rome, Julius Caesar and Antony.

3.description: A retired judge comes West to restore a ghost town.

4.name: The Little Princess
4.description: Little Sara Crewe is placed in a boarding school by her father when he goes off to war, but he does not understand that the headmistress is a cruel, spiteful woman who makes life miserable ...                See full summary »

5.name: Rapsodia satanica
5.description: A Faustian tale about an old woman who makes a pact with Mephisto to regain her youth, in return she must stay away from love. After the deal she meets two brothers who fall in love with her.

6.name: The Pride of the Clan
6.description: Among the simple fisher-folk of a little island off the west coast of Scotland lives MacTavish, head of a clan. Here he rules as a chieftain and his word is law. One day a hurricane sweeps ...                See full summary »

7.name: Terje Vigen
7.description: Terje Vigen, a sailor, suffers the loss of his family through the cruelty of another man. Years later, when his enemy's family finds itself dependent on Terje's beneficence, Terje must ...                See full summary »

8.name: The Little American
8.description: A young American has her ship torpedoed by a German U-boat but makes it back to ancestral home in France, where she witnesses German brutality firsthand.

9.name: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
9.description: With her family in financial difficulties, Rebecca is sent to live with her two strict, unfeeling aunts, who do not appreciate the young girl's charm and energy. Rebecca must make new ...                See full summary »

10.name: Patria
10.description: Serial about Japanese spies trying to invade the US but whose plans are foiled by a rich heiress and a Secret Service agent.

11.name: Straight Shooting
11.description: Cattleman Flint cuts off farmer Sims' water supply. When Sims' son Ted goes for water, one of Flint's men kills him. Cheyenne is sent to finish off Sims, but finding the family at the newly dug grave, he changes sides.

12.name: Les Misérables
12.description: Jean Valjean, a good and decent man who has committed a minor crime, is imprisoned but escapes. He is pursued thereafter for years by Javert, the cruel and implacable arm of the law.

13.name: A Romance of the Redwoods
13.description: A young girl travels west to live with her uncle during the California Gold Rush only to find that he has been killed by Indians and his identity assumed by an outlaw.

14.name: Der Golem und die Tänzerin
14.description: As a practical joke, an actor impersonates the screen monster he made famous. Complications ensue.

15.name: Wild and Woolly
15.description: A rich young Easterner who has always wanted to live in "the Wild West" plans to move to a Western town. Unknown to him, the town's "wild" days are long gone, and it is an orderly, ...                See full summary »

16.name: The Secret Man
16.description: Convict Cheyenne Harry escapes from prison in a garbage truck and boards a train, where he eludes capture with the help of passenger Henry Beaufort.

17.name: The Woman God Forgot
17.description: Cortez sends Alvarado to Montezuma who throws him into a dungeon from which he is rescued by Tecza who loves him. He is recaptured when her lover Guatemoco finds Alvarado hiding in her ...                See full summary »

19.name: Umirayushchiy lebed
19.description: A grief-stricken ballerina becomes the obsession of an increasingly unhinged artist.

20.name: Madame Du Barry
20.description: Jeanette (Theda Bara), unknown in Paris but of great beauty and wit, attracts the attention of Louis XV (Charles Clary) who expresses a desire to meet her to Jean Du Barry (Herschel Mayall)...                See full synopsis »

21.name: Tom Sawyer
21.description: Tom Sawyer, a young Missouri lad, finds fun and adventure with his pals Joe Harper and Huckleberry Finn, running away to hide out on Jackson's Island and pretending to be Mississippi River ...                See full summary »

22.name: Das fidele Gefängnis
22.description: A neglected wife disguises herself in order to lure her wastrel husband into a compromising position.

23.name: The Black Stork
23.description: A young man and woman are considering marriage; eugenicist Harry J Haiselden warns that they are ill-matched and will produce defective offspring. He is right; their baby is born defective,...                See full summary »

24.name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
24.description: A doctor's wife is the head of a bureau that publishes and hands out literature on birth control. However, the police stop it and forbid her to speak in meetings about the secret that was ...                See full summary »

25.name: Bucking Broadway
25.description: A ranch foreman battles a rich stockbroker for the affections of a beautiful young woman.

26.name: Pençe
26.description: The story of two male friends who are Pertev and Vasfi. Pertev who believes that the marriage always brings about evil things and women are coarse and ignorant stringently discusses with ...                See full summary »

27.name: Raffles, the Amateur Cracksman
27.description: Gentleman burglar Raffles tries to get his hand on a priceless pearl.

29.name: Runaway Romany
29.description: "Inky" Ames, theatrical press agent, through a fictitious story makes it appear that Anitra St. Clair, an actress, is the long lost daughter of Theodore True, the copper king. True accepts ...                See full summary »

30.name: El apóstol
30.description: Argentinian President Yrigoyen burns Buenos Aires using Jupiter's thunderbolts.

31.name: Kidnapped
31.description: In Scotland in 1751, young David Balfour is shanghaied aboard a ship where he meets Jacobite rebel Alan Breck Stewart with whom he escapes to the Scottish Highlands, dodging the redcoats.

32.name: Seven Keys to Baldpate
32.description: A writer bets a friend that he can write a 10,000-word novel in 24 hours. The friends takes the bet, and gives him the keys to his Baldpate Inn, which has been closed for the winter, so he ...                See full summary »

33.name: The End of the Tour
33.description: Col. Jessup of Mayville does not waste any affection on his young wife, who finally runs away with a theatrical company, taking her son with her, but leaving her baby daughter. Later, she ...                See full summary »

34.name: Aladdin and the Wonderful Lamp
34.description: The story of Aladdin and the Princess Badr al-badr's adventures as told through child actors.

35.name: Reaching for the Moon
35.description: A factory worker has always dreamed that he was meant for better things, to be rich and famous and in "the company of kings". One day he discovers that he is indeed the only heir to the ...                See full summary »

36.name: A Tale of Two Cities
36.description: Alcoholic lawyer Sydney Carton travels to Paris during the Reign of Terror to rescue French aristocrat Charles Darnay, husband of the woman he loves.

37.name: Satyavadi Raja Harishchandra
37.description: The homage to the upright King Harishchandra who almost sacrifices his kingdom for his love of truth, opens with a tableau showing the king, his wife Taramati and his young son, to whom he ...                See full summary »

38.name: A Doll's House
38.description: Nora Helmer has years earlier committed a forgery in order to save the life of her authoritarian husband Torvald. Now she is being blackmailed lives in fear of her husband's finding out and...                See full summary »

40.name: Hilde Warren und der Tod
40.description: Hilde Warren, a famous actress, is impregnated by a convicted murderer and becomes plagued by visions of an extremely gaunt and sepulchral Death. Upon discovering her child is the image of ...                See full summary »

41.name: The Auction Block
41.description: A wealthy businessman proudly watches as his son begins his own business, a shoe store. However, things start to take a turn for the worst when the father's estranged wife inserts herself ...                See full summary »

44.name: Mater dolorosa
44.description: Sad story of an unfaithful wife and her subsequent sufferings as a mother.

45.name: The Secret Game
45.description: During the Great War, German and Japanese spies face off in the United States.

46.name: A Marked Man
46.description: A mother is convinced her son is a ranch owner when in fact he is an outlaw, and she just saves him from hanging.

48.name: Envy
48.description: Eve Leslie is a poor country girl, who wishes she could have fine clothes, motors and wealthy friends. The person she envies most is Betty Howard, a famous actress. Eve does not know that ...                See full summary »

49.name: Das Bildnis des Dorian Gray
49.description: A variation of the famous Oscar Wilde tale in which Dorian Gray's soul is manifested in a painting instead of his own body.
